meanings.sent1: The cat stays on the mat.
meanings.sent2: The sun stays in the sky during the day.
meanings.sent3: The book stays on the shelf, refusing to be read.
meanings.sent4: Her smile stays in my memory like a painting on a wall.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh flowers stays in the room, filling it with fragrance.

meanings.definition: Stop or cause to stop making progress.
meanings.sent1: He stays the clock to make time stand still.
meanings.sent2: The traffic jam stays the cars from moving forward.
meanings.sent3: The stubborn knot stays the rope from unraveling.
meanings.sent4: Fear can stay our courage in challenging times.
meanings.sent5: A sudden realization can stay our confusion, bringing clarity.

meanings.sent1: The pillars stay the roof above our heads.
meanings.sent2: Kind words can stay a person's spirit in tough times.
meanings.sent3: Laughter stays our hearts, lifting our mood.
meanings.sent4: Friendship can stay us through the storms of life.
meanings.sent5: Music has the power to stay our emotions, resonating within us.
